sentence: Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., also noted the manufacturing issue, while calling for inflation-fighting moves to aid Americans.
author: Ronald J. Hansen
title: Unity at start of Biden's State of the Union speech gives way to familiar domestic battles

sentence: Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly has taken the lead in getting the bill passed, and noted in November, after getting it out of committee, that “it is a captivating natural and geological wonder— a real gem in our state.” “Chiricahua Monument is a natural wonder and deserves to be a national park," he said in a public statement on Thursday.
author: Bennito L. Kelty
title: Senate OKs bill to establish Chiricahua National Park, measure still awaits House action

sentence: In Douglas on Wednesday, Senator Mark Kelly said the immigration system was stressed before Title 42 and lifting the restriction should make things worse.
author: Craig Smith
title: Rep. Grijalva splits with Senators on Title 42
